gurmukhi: ਅਾਤਮਾ ਤ੍ਰਿਬਿਧੀ ਜਤ੍ਰ ਕਤ੍ਰ ਸੈ ੲਿਕਤ੍ਰ ਭੲੇ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਮਨ ਮਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Aatamaa Tribidhee Jatr Katr Sai Ikatr Bhaay , Gurmati Sati Nihachal Man Maanay Hai ?
translation: With the acquisition of True Guru's consecration and His wisdom, the mind wandering in three traits of maya becomes stable and then it feels reassured in the words of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਜਗਜੀਵਨ ਜਗ ਜਗ ਜਗਜੀਵਨ ਮੈ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ੳੁਰ ਅਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jagajeevan Jag Jag Jagajeevan Mai , Pooran Brahamagiaan Dhiaan Ur Aanay Hai ?
translation: One who has received the elixir-like Name of the Lord, practiced it, sees the Lord and the world intermingled. That Sikh of the Guru imbibes the knowledge in his heart since it has been blessed by the complete God-like True Guru.

gurmukhi: ਸੂਖਮ ਸਥੂਲ ਮੂਲ ੲੇਕ ਹੀ ਅਨੇਕ ਮੇਕ ਗੋਰਸ ਗੋਬੰਸ ਗਤਿ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਪਹਿਚਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sookham Sadool Mool Ayk Hee Anayk Mayka , Goras Gobans Gati Praym Pahichaanay Hai ?
translation: The loving hue of Lord's name, the Sikh of the Guru recognises the presence of the Lord in gross and imperceptible species just as well species of cows yield same type of milk.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਰਨ ਮੈ ਕਾਰਨ ਕਰਨ ਚਿਤ੍ਰਿ ਮੈ ਚਿਤੇਰੋ ਜੰਤ੍ਰ ਧੁਨਿ ਜੰਤ੍ਰੀ ਜਨ ਕੈ ਜਨਕ ਜਾਨੇ ਹੈ ॥੨੨੭॥
transliteration: Kaaran Mai Kaaran Karan Chitri Mai Chitayro , Jantr Dhouni Jantree Jan Kai Janak Jaanay Hai ?227?
translation: He realises that the Lord is permeated in His creation as is a painter in his painting, a tune in the musical instrument and qualities of father in his son. (227)
